title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Basic Life Support (BLS) Training

context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environment using smartphone-based LMS, targeting office/administrative professionals, with goals of acquiring BLS (Basic Life Support) skills, patient safety, and certification

learning_goals: Learners can perform adult/child CPR step-by-step with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can apply automated external defibrillator (AED) usage without errors in three practice scenarios.
Learners adhere to role division and communication protocols in two-person collaborative CPR scenarios with 90% compliance.
Learners submit case analysis reports based on international BLS guidelines.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
